main event: Several witnesses in York, Pennsylvania observed a bright moving object forming an arc, described as cone-shaped with a round base on January 10, 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted only 2-3 seconds., The object moved at rapid speeds., It was sighted by multiple people., The shape of the UFO was cone-shaped with a round base., The report concludes it could possibly be a meteor sighting.
sighted object: a bright moving object forming an arc, cone-shaped with a round base
